mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group_board (gbno, gb_title, gb_content, userid, gb_notice, gb_pic) values (seq_group_board_gbno.nextval, #{gb_title}, #{gb_content}, #{userid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gb_notice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gb_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_group_board order by gbno desc
select * from tbl_group_board where gb_notice = 'on' order by gbno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_group_board gb set gb.gb_comment = (select count(*) from tbl_group_board_comment where gbno = #{gbno}) where gb.gbno = #{gbno}
